import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { EmpformserviceService } from './empformservice.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-employeeform', templateUrl: './employeeform.component.html', styleUrls: ['./employeeform.component.scss'] }) export class EmployeeformComponent { constructor(private empservice: EmpformserviceService) { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
